official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to sell certain parcels of land located in the Hungry Gulch Recreation area in the State of California.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to offer to sell certain parcels of land to named individuals at the fair market value as determined by the Secretary after consulting with the Chief of Engineers of the Army.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to sell certain parcels of land located in the Hungry Gulch Recreation area in the State of California.
